text: لا فيها غول ولا هم عنها ينزفون

translations.translation: which has no headache in it and does not leave them stupefied.
Neither dulling the senses nor intoxicating,
There will neither be any harm in it for their body nor will it intoxicate their mind.
Neither does it intoxicate, nor give a headache.
Neither will they have Ghawl from that nor will they suffer intoxication therefrom.
There shall be no trouble in it, nor shall they be exhausted therewith.
wherein no sickness is, neither intoxication;
Wherein there is no headache nor are they made mad thereby.
No headiness there shall be therein, nor shall they be therewith Inebriated.
wherein there will be neither headache nor will it cause them stupefaction,
Free from headiness; nor will they suffer intoxication therefrom.
Neither they will have Ghoul (any kind of hurt, abdominal pain, headache, a sin, etc.) from that, nor will they suffer intoxication therefrom.
there is neither sickness in it, nor intoxication.
No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.

[37:47] wherein there is neither madness, nothing to snatch away their minds, nor will they be spent by it (read yunzafūna or yunzifūna, from [1st form] nazafa or [4th form] anzafa, said of one drinking, in other words, they are [not] inebriated [by it], in contrast to the wine of this world),

Wherein) in drinking this wine (there is no headache) stomach-ache, drunkenness, harm or sinning (nor are they made mad thereby) because of intoxication; it is also said that this means: they never run out of it.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { لاَ فِيهَا غَوْلٌ } معناه أَذى وذهابُ عَقلٍ
 وقال: وجعُ البَطنِ { وَلاَ هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ } معناه لا ينقطعُ ذلك عنهم، ولا تَنْزِفُ عُقُولُهُم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ لا فيها غَوْلٌ } أي: لا تغتال عقولَهم فتذهب بها، كخمر الدنيا، وهو من: غاله يغوله: إذا أهلكه وأفسده
 أو: لا فيها غول: إثم، أو وجع بطن أو صداع، وهو وجع الرأس، أي: لا ينشأ عنها شيء مما ذكر
 { ولا هم عنها يُنْزَفُون } يسكرون، من: نُزِف الشارب: إذا ذهب عقله
 ويقال للسكران: نزيف، ومنزوف
 ومَن قرأ بكسر الزاي فمعناه: لا يَنْفَد شرابهم، يقال: أنزف الرجل فهو مُنزف: إذا فنيت خمرته
